divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my frends baceball game and in the forth inning and i saw a plane coming in the distance but when i looked in my bonoculars i saw a strange object about 4 seconds later i looked up and saw a small disc like ufo with 3 green lights in the middle with 1 blue ray type things coming out of the three green lights each blue ray came to the outer ring with was coverd whith small red lights. then sudinly a forth light appered it was a strange redish yelloyish color . my other frend mich asked what i was lookig at but i was in so much shock and aww that i could not speek. then i saw a bright flash and it was gone. i never told any one this story before until now.
Summary: small disc like three green lights in middle.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mt Pleasant
There were no other sightings in Mt Pleasant on or around June 10th 2004
This sighting has never been favorited.
